chunk:
Directions: Twist up shea butter stick and massage product into skin. Can be used to hydrate face & body.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 2594-Black Radiance Moisture & Nourish Balm, 9320 Shea Radiance (2018 formulation)
